00041 driver_status_struct    driver_status;

00044 #define LM76_ADDR 0x90

00047 unsigned int counter_compare0 = 0;
00049 unsigned int counter_sync=0;
00051 unsigned int counter_ping_interval=0;

00060 void activate_output(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char index, unsigned char type) {
00061         driver_status.driver_output_state |= (1<<(index-1));
00062         driver_status.driver_output_owner[index-1] = from_addr;
00063 
00064         driver_status.driver_output_type[index-1] = type;
00065 
00066         switch (index) {
00067                 case 1 :        PORTD |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_1);
00068                                                         break;
00069                 case 2 :        PORTD |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_2);
00070                                                         break;
00071                 case 3 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_3);
00072                                                         break;
00073                 case 4 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_4);
00074                                                         break;
00075                 case 5 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_5);
00076                                                         break;
00077                 case 6 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_6);
00078                                                         break;
00079                 case 7 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_7);
00080                                                         break;
00081                 case 8 :        PORTC |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_8);
00082                                                         break;
00083                 case 9 :        PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_9);
00084                                                         break;
00085                 case 10 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_10);
00086                                                         break;
00087                 case 11 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_11);
00088                                                         break;
00089                 case 12 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_12);
00090                                                         break;
00091                 case 13 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_13);
00092                                                         break;
00093                 case 14 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_14);
00094                                                         break;
00095                 case 15 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_15);
00096                                                         break;
00097                 case 16 :       PORTA |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_16);
00098                                                         break;
00099                 case 17 :       PORTB |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_17);
00100                                                         break;
00101                 case 18 :       PORTB |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_18);
00102                                                         break;
00103                 case 19 :       PORTB |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_19);
00104                                                         break;
00105                 case 20 :       PORTB |= (1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_20);
00106                                                         break;
00107                 default: 
00108                                                         break;
00109         }
00110 }

00118 void deactivate_output(unsigned char from_addr, unsigned char index) {
00119         driver_status.driver_output_state &= ~(1<<(index-1));
00120         driver_status.driver_output_owner[index-1] = from_addr;
00121         driver_status.driver_output_type[index-1] = 0;
00122 
00123         switch (index) {
00124                 case 1 :        PORTD &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_1);
00125                                                         break;
00126                 case 2 :        PORTD &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_2);
00127                                                         break;
00128                 case 3 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_3);
00129                                                         break;
00130                 case 4 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_4);
00131                                                         break;
00132                 case 5 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_5);
00133                                                         break;
00134                 case 6 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_6);
00135                                                         break;
00136                 case 7 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_7);
00137                                                         break;
00138                 case 8 :        PORTC &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_8);
00139                                                         break;
00140                 case 9 :        PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_9);
00141                                                         break;
00142                 case 10 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_10);
00143                                                         break;
00144                 case 11 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_11);
00145                                                         break;
00146                 case 12 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_12);
00147                                                         break;
00148                 case 13 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_13);
00149                                                         break;
00150                 case 14 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_14);
00151                                                         break;
00152                 case 15 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_15);
00153                                                         break;
00154                 case 16 :       PORTA &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_16);
00155                                                         break;
00156                 case 17 :       PORTB &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_17);
00157                                                         break;
00158                 case 18 :       PORTB &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_18);
00159                                                         break;
00160                 case 19 :       PORTB &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_19);
00161                                                         break;
00162                 case 20 :       PORTB &= ~(1<<DRIVER_OUTPUT_20);
00163                                                         break;
00164                 default: 
00165                                                         break;
00166         }
00167 }

00173 unsigned int lm76_get_temp(void) {
00174         unsigned char temp[2];
00175         i2cMasterReceiveNI(LM76_ADDR,2,(unsigned char *)temp);
00176 
00177         return((((temp[0]<<8) | temp[1]) >> 3));
00178 }

00184 void bus_parse_message(void) {
00185         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message = rx_queue_get();
00186 
00187         if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_ACK)
00188                 bus_message_acked();
00189         else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_NACK)
00190                 bus_message_nacked();
00191         else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_PING) {
00192                 
00193         }
00194         else {
00195                 if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT) {
00196                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00197                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT);
00198                 }
00199                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT) {
00200                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00201                                 deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i]);
00202                 }
00203                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT) {
00204                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00205                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT);
00206                 }
00207                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT) {
00208                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00209                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT);
00210                 }
00211                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT) {
00212                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00213                                 activate_output(bus_message.from_addr,bus_message.data[i], BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT);
00214                 }               
00215                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_GET_STATUS) {
00216                         
00217                 }
00218                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_OUTPUTS) {
00219                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00220                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_owner[i-1] == bus_message.from_addr)
00221                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00222                 }
00223                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_ANT_OUTPUTS) {
00224                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00225                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_ANT_OUTPUT)
00226                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00227                 }
00228                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_ANTENNA_OUTPUTS) {
00229                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00230                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT)
00231                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00232                 }               
00233                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT) {
00234                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00235                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_ANT_OUTPUT)
00236                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00237                 }
00238                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_RX_BAND_OUTPUTS) {
00239                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00240                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT)
00241                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00242                 }               
00243                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT) {
00244                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00245                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_RX_BAND_OUTPUT)
00246                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00247                 }       
00248                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_DEACTIVATE_ALL_BAND_OUTPUTS) {
00249                         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00250                                 if (driver_status.driver_output_type[i-1] == BUS_CMD_DRIVER_ACTIVATE_BAND_OUTPUT)
00251                                         deactivate_output(bus_message.from_addr,i);
00252                 }
00253                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_GET_TEMPERATURE) {
00254                         unsigned int temp_t = lm76_get_temp();
00255                         unsigned char temp[2];
00256                         temp[0] = (temp_t & 0xFF00) >> 8;
00257                         temp[1] = (temp_t & 0x00FF);
00258 
00259                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), bus_message.from_addr, 0, BUS_CMD_GET_TEMPERATURE,2, temp);
00260                 }
00261                 else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_SYNC) {
00262                 }
00263         }
00264         
00265         //Drop the message
00266         rx_queue_drop();
00267 }
00268 
00272 unsigned char read_ext_addr(void) {
00273         return(~(PIND >> 4) & 0x0F);
00274 }
00275 
00277 int main(void)
00278 {
00279         cli();
00280 
00281         delay_ms(100);
00282 
00283         driver_status.driver_output_state = 0;
00284 
00285         /* Read the external address of the device */
00286         bus_set_address(BUS_BASE_ADDR+read_ext_addr());
00287 
00288         /* This delay is simply so that if you have the devices connected to the same power supply
00289         all units should not send their status messages at the same time. Therefor we insert a delay
00290         that is based on the external address of the device */
00291         delay_ms(7 * bus_get_address());
00292 
00293         /* Initialize various hardware resources */
00294         init_ports();
00295 
00296         //Initialize the communication bus      
00297         bus_init();
00298         
00299         //The device should not be master
00300         bus_set_is_master(0,0);
00301 
00302         //Timer used for the communication bus. The interrupt is caught in bus.c
00303         init_timer_2(); 
00304         
00305         //Timer with interrupts each ms
00306         init_timer_0(); 
00307         
00308         sei();
00309 
00310         for (unsigned char i=1;i<=20;i++)
00311                 deactivate_output(0x00,i);
00312 
00313         while(1) {      
00314                 if (!rx_queue_is_empty()) {
00315                         bus_parse_message();
00316                 }
00317 
00318                 if (!tx_queue_is_empty())
00319                         bus_check_tx_status();
00320         }
00321         
00322         return (0);
00323 }
00324 
00326 ISR(SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE0) {
00327         if (bus_allowed_to_send()) {
00328                 //Check if a ping message should be sent out on the bus
00329                 if (counter_ping_interval >= BUS_DEVICE_STATUS_MESSAGE_INTERVAL) {
00330                         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_PING, 1, (unsigned char *)DEVICE_ID_DRIVER_POS);
00331                         counter_ping_interval = 0;
00332                 }
00333         }
00334 
00335         counter_ping_interval++;
00336         counter_compare0++;
00337 }
